Comment: By Jenna deJong - Digital Media Reporter:   Grassroots organization 50501 is mobilizing for another major national protest on Thursday, May 1, as part of its ongoing resistance against President Donald Trump's second term. Like its previous planned protests, the upcoming "May Day" demonstrations will span all 50 states, with events planned in cities from Seattle to New York.  Since Trump's return to the White House in January, 50501 has helped organize some of the largest protests across the country, aiming to channel widespread frustration into coordinated political action. The group's latest initiative continues its campaign of peaceful resistance, using the symbolism of May Day—a historic day of worker solidarity—to spotlight broader concerns about democracy and rising authoritarianism.  Read more: https://www.newsweek.com/map-list-cities-may-day-50501-protests-trump-2065323
Author: newsweek
